title: ADHybridHealthService
description: REST APIs for Azure Active Directory Connect Health

addsServices_list.title: Gets the details of Active Directory Domain Service, for a tenant, that are onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.
addsServices_list.description: Gets the details of Active Directory Domain Service, for a tenant, that are onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

addsServices_add.title: Onboards a service for a given tenant in Azure Active Directory Connect Health.
addsServices_add.description: Onboards a service for a given tenant in Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

addsServices_listPremiumServices.title: Gets the details of Active Directory Domain Services for a tenant having Azure AD Premium license and is onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.
addsServices_listPremiumServices.description: Gets the details of Active Directory Domain Services for a tenant having Azure AD Premium license and is onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

addsServices_delete.title: Deletes an Active Directory Domain Service which is onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.
addsServices_delete.description: Deletes an Active Directory Domain Service which is onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

addsServices_get.description: Gets the details of an Active Directory Domain Service for a tenant having Azure AD Premium license and is onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

addsServices_update.title: Updates an Active Directory Domain Service properties of an onboarded service.
addsServices_update.description: Updates an Active Directory Domain Service properties of an onboarded service.

adDomainServiceMembers_list.title: Gets the details of the servers, for a given Active Directory Domain Service, that are onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.
adDomainServiceMembers_list.description: Gets the details of the servers, for a given Active Directory Domain Service, that are onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.
